byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Jeb Bush is incurring the ire of Republican rivals and some party leaders as he moves aggressively to lock down top consulting talent for his 2016 presidential bid; has leveraged his family's political influence to poach advisers from fellow Republicans, demanding fidelity that some see as premature and even ruthless.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush has pursued top campaign donors, political operatives and policy experts with a relentlessness that, in the eyes of rivals, seems ruthless.

headline.main: Bush Campaign’s Demand for Fidelity Ruffles Some Republican Rivals
headline.print_headline: Bush Campaign’s Demand for Fidelity Ruffles Some Republican Rivals

snippet: Mr. Bush has pursued top campaign donors, political operatives and policy experts with a relentlessness that, in the eyes of rivals, seems ruthless.
